root.name: Gary Grigsby's World At War
root.description: A World War Two turn-based strategy game that allows the user to lead 1 of 5 nations through the war. The 5 factions are: China, Japan, Germany (combined with Italy), the Soviet Union and the Western Allies. A full scenario lasts from the Spring of 1940 to the Fall of 1946, although the player may choose from a variety of start dates. Although strength in numbers is crucial to victory, every individual battle is randomized making it possible to win a battle despite being outnumbered
